title: Strippers Love Anal
overview: Don't Touch Her: Ramon is in a miserable marriage with a woman who hates sex. Their therapist suggested spicing up their sex life by visiting a strip club together.  Don't Touch Her 2: Bill's girlfriend agreed to spend this birthday at a strip club, but she won't even let Bill touch their stripper!  Don't Touch Her 3: Charles just wants a nice lap dance but his uptight girlfriend is being a naggy shithead.  Abella Best Her Butt: Sexy stripper Abella knows what her ass is worth, so when a VIP customer will pay for anal sex she decides if she can make him cum with her mouth and hands, he as to pay up.  Don't Go Through That Door: It's Cindy Loarn's first day at her new job as a barmaid. Her boss has given her two simple tasks: bus tables, and don't go through that mysterious door.
